Class Vec2Mat

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sytes.botg.array.math.Vec2Mat

  • public class Vec2Mat
extends java.lang.Object

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static double[][] fixedWindows(double[] ar, int windowSize, boolean dropUneven)
      separates the given double array into windows of size windowSize
      if dropUneven is true, then the remaining last ar.length % windowSize elements are dropped
      dimensions --> double[win][windowSize]
      static double[][] overlapWindows(double[] ar, int windowSize, int overlap)
      separates the given double array ar
      static double[][] separateDataIntoWindows(double[] data, int window, boolean dropUneven)
      returns the array data split into windows of size window if dropUneven is set to false, then the remaining elements are filled with NaN

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
